  • Method Details

    • getAdminByUsername

      Admin getAdminByUsername(String username) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, AdminNotFoundException
      Retrieves an admin by username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the admin to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Admin object corresponding to the given username.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs while accessing the database.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If a database connection exception occurs.
      AdminNotFoundException - If the admin with the specified username is not found.

    • getAdminById

      Admin getAdminById(int adminId) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, AdminNotFoundException
      Retrieves an admin by ID.
      Parameters:
      adminId - The ID of the admin to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Admin object corresponding to the given ID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs while accessing the database.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If a database connection exception occurs.
      AdminNotFoundException - If the admin with the specified ID is not found.

    • registerAdmin

      boolean registerAdmin(Admin admin) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, InvalidInputException
      Registers a new admin.
      Parameters:
      admin - The Admin object containing the details to be registered.
      Returns:
      True if the admin is registered successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs while accessing the database.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If a database connection exception occurs.
      InvalidInputException - If the input provided for registration is invalid.

    • updateAdmin

      boolean updateAdmin(String username, int choice) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, AdminNotFoundException
      Updates the information of an existing admin.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the admin to be updated.
      choice - The choice representing the field to be updated.
      Returns:
      True if the admin information is updated successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs while accessing the database.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If a database connection exception occurs.
      AdminNotFoundException - If the admin with the specified username is not found.

    • deleteAdmin

      void deleteAdmin(int adminId) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, AdminNotFoundException
      Deletes an admin based on the admin ID.
      Parameters:
      adminId - The ID of the admin to be deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs while accessing the database.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If a database connection exception occurs.
      AdminNotFoundException - If the admin with the specified ID is not found.
